title: Heurist AI
description: Skills for interacting with Heurist AI services, including image generation and other AI capabilities

image_generation_animagine_xl.title: Japanese Anime Image Generation
image_generation_animagine_xl.description: Generate Japanese anime-style images using Heurist's AnimagineXL model based on text prompts

image_generation_arthemy_comics.title: Comic Style Image Generation
image_generation_arthemy_comics.description: Generate comic-style images using Heurist's ArthemyComics model based on text prompts

image_generation_arthemy_real.title: Realistic Image Generation
image_generation_arthemy_real.description: Generate realistic images using Heurist's ArthemyReal model based on text prompts

image_generation_braindance.title: Artistic Image Generation
image_generation_braindance.description: Generate artistic images using Heurist's BrainDance model based on text prompts

image_generation_cyber_realistic_xl.title: Cyberpunk Hyperrealistic Image Generation
image_generation_cyber_realistic_xl.description: Generate hyperrealistic photographs with a cyberpunk aesthetic using Heurist's CyberRealisticXL model based on text prompts

image_generation_flux_1_dev.title: Versatile Image Generation (Flux)
image_generation_flux_1_dev.description: Generate versatile images in any style using Heurist's Flux.1-dev model based on text prompts

image_generation_sdxl.title: High-Quality Image Generation (SDXL)
image_generation_sdxl.description: Generate high-quality images in any style using Heurist's SDXL model based on text prompts

states.description: States for each Heurist AI skill (disabled, public, or private)

api_key.title: Heurist API Key
api_key.description: API key for Heurist AI services, if you have one, you can set the rate limit for your user

rate_limit_number.title: Rate Limit Number
rate_limit_number.description: Number of requests allowed per time window, only valid if api_key is set

rate_limit_minutes.title: Rate Limit Minutes
rate_limit_minutes.description: Time window in minutes for rate limiting, only valid if api_key is set
